item.title: Starcraft: the Revolution of eSports
item.author: Carol Yang,
item.description: The lights of the metropolis shine brightly on the clear summer night. Down on the bay, a crowd gathers around a giant outdoor screen. Spotlights flood the area as the audience,now exceeding 50,000 people, work themselves into a fever pitch. The two teams come out on stage to deafening cheers. â€¦
